org.parosproxy.paros.extension

Interface Extension

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtensionActiveScan, ExtensionAdaptor, ExtensionAlert, ExtensionAntiCSRF, ExtensionAPI, ExtensionAuth, ExtensionAuthentication, ExtensionAuthorization, ExtensionAutoUpdate, ExtensionBreak, ExtensionCompare, ExtensionDynSSL, ExtensionEdit, ExtensionEncoder2, ExtensionExtension, ExtensionFilter, ExtensionForcedUser, ExtensionFuzz, ExtensionFuzz, ExtensionGlobalExcludeURL, ExtensionHelp, ExtensionHistory, ExtensionHttpPanelAMFView, ExtensionHttpPanelComponentAll, ExtensionHttpPanelHexView, ExtensionHttpPanelImageView, ExtensionHttpPanelLargeRequestView, ExtensionHttpPanelLargeResponseView, ExtensionHttpPanelRequestFormTableView, ExtensionHttpPanelRequestQueryCookieTableView, ExtensionHttpPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, ExtensionHttpSessions, ExtensionKeyboard, ExtensionLog4j, ExtensionManualRequestEditor, ExtensionOption, ExtensionParams, ExtensionPassiveScan, ExtensionReauth, ExtensionRegister, ExtensionReport, ExtensionRequestPostTableView, ExtensionScript, ExtensionSearch, ExtensionSessionManagement, ExtensionSitesRefresh, ExtensionSpider, ExtensionState, ExtensionStdMenus, ExtensionUiUtils, ExtensionUserManagement

    public interface Extension
    Life cycle for an extension . init . initModel - the extension obtain the data model . initXML . getExtensionHook - workbench obtain the view of the plugin . start() . stop() . May go back to 5 depending on options or menu chosen. . destroy

      • getName

        String getName()

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()

      • init

        void init()
        Initialize plugin during startup. This phase is carried out before all others.

      • initModel

        void initModel(Model model)
        Initialization of plugin after obtaining data model from core. Method should not depend on view.
        Parameters:
        model -

      • initView

        void initView(ViewDelegate view)

        Model getModel()

      • getView

        ViewDelegate getView()

      • start

        void start()
        Start the plugin eg if there is a running server.

      • stop

        void stop()
        stop the plugin eg if there is a running server.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Plugin cleanup, finalize etc when program shutdown. Stop() will be called before shutdown.

      • initXML

        void initXML(Session session,
           OptionsParam options)
        Initialize session and options parameter if required XML node not in either files.
        Parameters:
        session -
        options -

        void optionsLoaded()
        Called after the options for this extension have been loaded, so that the extension can make use of them.

      • unload

        void unload()

      • getUnsavedResources

        List<String> getUnsavedResources()
        Extensions should return the user friendly names of any unsaved resources - if there are any the user will be given the option not to exit.
        Returns:

      • postInstall

        void postInstall()
        Implement this method to perform tasks after the add-on is installed. Note that this will only be called if the user adds the add-on via ZAP, eg file the File menu or the Marketplace. If the add-on is installed by copying the file to the plugins directory then it will not be called.
